https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3rrkyLYbgLj84AYvjhdcJot4JPx.jpg In 1973, 15-year-old William Miller's unabashed love of music and aspiration to become a rock journalist lands him an assignment from Rolling Stone magazine to interview and tour with the up-and-coming band, Stillwater. Almost Famous
